description:
I was floored to get a text message from Wayne saying he wanted to come back and do more. I explained what "more" meant, and it took him a couple days to commit to the video.
I am pretty sure that Wayne hit his limit on this one, so you better join now, as this might be his only one. Though, I was surprised when he wanted to come back and do "more"
In Wayne's own words, he says he is "VERY" straight, and this was a major deal for him. I believe him.
And you can tell. I hate to admit it, but he's down right nervous the first part of this video. We took our time (almost 10 minutes of cock sucking to warm him up, though his dick seemed to like the attention.)
But he finally gets in to it, and after finding a good position for him, (doggy style!) he really lets Zack have it.
If you like your boys straight, nervous, then getting in to it, this video is a classic.
Not to mention another amazing cumshot from Zack - he's a machine!
title: Wayne & Zack Randall - Wrapped
